sentences.english: Members chosen by functional constituencies are mostly pro-government.
sentences.chinese: 而选自功能界别议席的成员大都亲政府。

sentences.english: By 2016 at the latest, abolish all Functional Constituencies.
sentences.chinese: 然后最迟于2016年，全面取消功能界别议席。
